website_summaries.verdict: One of the best overall options for a folding table. Folds in half for easier storage.
pros: We love the extremely lightweight design
Comes in at only 22 lbs., making it easy to move around and set up in a variety of spaces
cons: Legs sometimes fail to lock in place without extra force

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality and not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: purchased the table for dining. The table is very light and loose, and it shakes very badly with little contact. tried to tighten the screws but still the same. not sure what you can use the table for the crazy shaking. don't understand all the good reviews and maybe mine is simply defected. contacted the customer service and was told that the wobbling was 'normal'. look at the video for the wobbling when pushed only with two fingers and make your own judgement. I have used several plastic tables and this one is by far the worst.
customer_reviews.author: LEE

customer_reviews.title: Update on my review.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this out to use for the first time....in opening the legs, 2 of them broke off. Not happy. 1/10/2018 I am so happy to edit this review. Today I received a replacement table for this one that didn't work for me. Amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SJBGKY

customer_reviews.title: easy to get and perhaps reusable as a party table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table so we could use it temporarily in a new apartment we are downsizing to. I was skeptical but it was inexpensive, easy to get and perhaps reusable as a party table. It was a great buy. With a canvas cloth over that goes to the ground it is quite elegant & very sturdy and allowed me to see what a 48” round table would look like with my chairs before I purchase a permanent table. You can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.author: B.T

customer_reviews.title: love the flexibility of using this
customer_reviews.text: I work in a school and wanted a round table for my counseling office that I could fold up and get out of the way when I needed the extra room. This is great. Hard to clean off marks so I recommend a table cloth of some sort if there will be any coloring going on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Kathrens

customer_reviews.title: Slight dip
customer_reviews.text: Nice table but does dip a little bit if you are sitting directly perpendicular to the folding line. Used it for poker and things fell off the table a couple of times. Not a major deal, but dont put a tom of weight at that area of minimal support.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: It's round and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My family uses this as a game table. Fits 5 of us, our game board, and cards comfortably. We bought this because of games like Settlers of Cataan fit a round table better than the other tables we have. Folding in half is nice for storage and moving around without banging it into walls and doors. If I needed one, I'd buy another. 4 stars because plastic tops warp when a lot of stuff is put on it like my kid's backpacks and school books. Still, for light use or as a game table, it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Well, I researched this product as I am a teacher and I needed these tables for my 8th Grade Science students. I was so excited to get them but disappointed when I set them up. They were wobbly and shaky on the flat surface of my classroom floor. I ended up returning all 4 of them that I ordered. I gave these 2 stars because they weren’t completely bad and probably would be okay on carpet and for short term use only, like playing a game of cards.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Round is the new rectangle
customer_reviews.text: This round table is fantastic, it is light weight, easy to move around, the size is perfect for my family's needs, it is the Goldilocks size. Everybody can fit around the table with ease, and it is comfortable to sit at, it is much better than heavy wooden tables that you can't move away and this table can be folded in half and be used as a half table as well. We took a risk, tried it, and fell in love with this table. If you are worried about the color of this table being white, you can always buy a round table cover, change it often and whenever you like depending on your mood.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Perrett

customer_reviews.title: Great game or puzzle table.
customer_reviews.text: Table works better than square card tables for mahjong and cards as it offers more space for the game or setting down drinks or food. Folds up nice with integrated carry handle. Except for odd folder shape it is pretty easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: DGB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lightweight, easy to store tables
customer_reviews.text: These are great, sturdy, lightweight tables. They are easy to set up and easy to take down. The fact that they fold in half and have a carrying handle makes it very easy to carry them and to store them. Our community theatre group has several of these which we use for special events. They have held up well over several years of use. I bought this one for the group because we needed an additional one for a wedding reception bring held in the garden area of our theater complex.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P. Champion

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: The quality for this table exceeded my expectations for the cost. We were looking for a game table that took no storage space. We couldn't ask for a more perfect fit for our needs. Would recommend this table to anyone looking for a game, puzzle or just a project table. Since we received this table we have tossed the standard card table. Will be ordering another table for card games. Thank you to all.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Olmsted

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is about to start college. I thought it would be a fun gift for his college days (and beyond) since he and his friends enjoy playing games to include poker! It folds up nicely - and although dorms are small - he does have a place in their room to store this one. I bought the "Fitted Round Elastic Edge Solid Green Felt Table Cover for Poker Puzzles Board Games Fits 36" to 48" Also Fits 36" Square Sold by: Derma Pad" and it fits 48 inch perfectly - went on nicely. Not too tight...looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Seana M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table and I love the portability of it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table and I love the portability of it. Very sturdy to hold a lot of weight. I would have given it a 5 star but it is a little wobbly and I mean just a little so for me I can live with it. If your looking for a table that doesn't wobble your going to pay big bucks and it wont have the portability like this one not to mention its light, easy to carry and store.
customer_reviews.author: stildreamn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This table arrived quickly and is so very easy to set up! It's very sturdy but not too heavy and I love that it has a handle to carry it out to the garage for storing! It's so much nicer than the dinky 34" card table I had been using! Tonight we get to try it out for our Mah Jongg game. It will need a cover because I think the tiles on the hard plastic table top will be too noisy but that's okay! It such a perfect size for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn R

customer_reviews.title: The worst product I have ever seen in my life.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it two legs broke off immediately. The worst product I have ever seen in my life. Incredibly flimsy should not even be sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cards
customer_reviews.text: Our neighborhood group meets monthly at a Community Building. Individuals take their hobbies--needlecraft, coupon clipping, adult coloring books...one group likes to play cards, but the round tables are too large to easily reach the discard pile. This table is perfect, and light enough so I can put it in the back of my car to take it easily. We were concerned that the fold in the center would be an unhandy crack in the top--but we don't even notice it. We are so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RFD Painter

customer_reviews.title: A bit wobbly but it should work and I love the size and the ease of unfolding it
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty round 70 inch table and it’s so much bigger than I thought but I’m so delighted! It does wobble a little and I have it on the rug so hopefully it will be OK Once I put plates & food on it. Something about a round table that I believe is so romantic! So much space in the center of the table which I’d love to show off my pretty crystal & fresh flowers!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy To Use & Store Folding Table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic folding table! I don’t have a lot of spare room in my house & needed something sturdy to set my photo cube & lights on for work. This table is super sturdy & has plenty of room for all my stuff! The legs open & close easily with a snap, and the table folds in half in 2 seconds for quick & easy storage in a closet or behind a couch — just fabulous for work & as a nice big table for guests & doing puzzles!
customer_reviews.author: jfree99

customer_reviews.title: arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned due to some reviews about getting a damaged table. The table arrived in a box with no padding, just a thick "bar" of cardboard at either end. The table was not damaged at all. We set up the table right away and it seems sturdy and did not wobble. I plan on using it for cards and mah jongg so it won't be heavily used. I'm satisfied witht he table, it's nice that it folds away for easy storage. The handle is strong and makes it easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: NOT recommended for daily use :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as classroom tables for my high school biology class. I am EXTREMELY disappointed. The tables are very rickety and shaky and squeak after just a few months of use. I bought a total of 8 and paid for these out of my own pocket. I had hoped to use them for years - now I'm not sure.. They certainly do not hold up to the "lifetime reputation" of being the best.... will not buy these again... If you are going to use these for long term everyday use, I do NOT recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jill Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Extra table for holidays
customer_reviews.text: During the holidays we find we need an additional table for more people. This works great - folds in half and stores easily under the bed. I would have preferred a more centered leg, but decided having one that folded was better for us. Best thing - I don't have to go get one, rent it and then return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dedorah C. Bolen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Round Foldable Table!
customer_reviews.text: This round table is amazing! I love it! It is sturdy, made well, easy to fold and unfold (just remember to fold down both legs at one time by pushing in the locking bracket, and then fold down the other two legs by repeating the first step). I purchased these amazing chairs to go with it in case you are looking for seating options.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria F.

customer_reviews.title: Great card table!
customer_reviews.text: Great card table. My octagonal folding card table top fits perfectly on it. Table folds in half, has a carrying strap. Lightweight but sturdy. I have some long tables from this manufacturer, too. Quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into our house and it was our first holiday hosting. We had thanksgiving. Everyone fit around the table and we still had some space. I was able to fold and put this away by myself post c-section. Was shocked how sturdy this was for the price. I Will def be buying another for our first summer outdoors🙂
customer_reviews.author: BeLLaDiiVa

customer_reviews.title: This table is great! I love that it folds in half
customer_reviews.text: This table is great! I love that it folds in half. I store it behind the sofa in the basement. Good quality and great to have around for parties, indoors or outside. I may buy another to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and to store
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter's open house and they were the perfect size for the space I had. I put 5 chairs around each one and it worked beautifully! I would recommend and I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Northland

customer_reviews.title: Yes please
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that sees my new table is always like, dang playa, nice table. And then I'm all like, thanks dude, it's well made and it's relatively light which makes it easy to move around. Then we high five and play cards.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P McNeil

customer_reviews.title: As plastic folding furniture goes, this is about as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: As plastic folding furniture goes, this is about as good as it gets. While not as pretty as high end patio furniture, this table is sturdy and easy to clean and folds away for storage, and is very cost effective. Legs fold in and table folds in half with a carry handle Very sturdy build, yet easy to carry. Table would likely store in a small spot. As long as you do not sit on it (not that sturdy) this should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Carlucci

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use outdoors for the holiday season. We are hoping to be able to have our family over but want separate tables for family grouping during Covid restrictions. We put to the curb our flimsy 20 year old card table. So happy that this foods in half and has a carrying handle. We can store it easily behind a sofa or under a bed. I wanted a round table so this will be great. I plan to use a table cloth and my holiday china and not worry about it collapsing.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M.

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Lifetime tables are the best on the market. They don't warp when items are placed on them. Very sturdy. It will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: BRETT

customer_reviews.title: Too portable...
customer_reviews.text: They fold great, the carrying handle is lovely, and they aren't too heavy. However they also seem to be too light to stand firmly without wobbling, it's not too bad honestly, just annoying... The only other thing is that some of them had minor plastic warping on edges.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I looked around and found this
customer_reviews.text: I got this table to start a game of D&D, i was worried that a traditional card table would be too small for 5-6 of us, I'm glad I looked around and found this, we all gather around it comfortably. The way it folds in half makes it perfect to tuck under a bed or a couch (not a love seat, they're too small), and so far setting it up and taking it down has been a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Swoon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Fold Table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for overflow seats for our family parties. It's very sturdy and easy to fold. No issues with it rocking or being unstable as others have mentioned. I felt comfortable enough with its stability to let our pre-teen family members eat off of fine china on it, so I obviously wasn't concerned about it's stability.
customer_reviews.author: TAZ

customer_reviews.title: This is now my dining room table.
customer_reviews.text: Lifetime makes great, sturdy products and this is no exception. I actually gave away my old dining table (which was always covered in projects and crud to be out away "later" and never open for actual dining) Now the space is open for workouts and when I have guests I bring out this study table then put it back in the closet after.
customer_reviews.author: M. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Great if you’re not planning to lean on it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I love that the support is in the middle of the table. I never worry about it collapsing. The only thing I don’t love is the edges of the table. We bought this for our puzzle table, and after leaning on it for a few hours, you definitely notice a bend. Other than that, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Riddle

customer_reviews.title: missing screws for handle
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice and sturdy. Mine did not come with the handle screwed on but loose. Lifetime does not carry the screws in there shop and could not help replace it. This is very poor customer service on their part. Now i have the choice of returning it or just going out and buy a screw.
customer_reviews.author: dave terwilliger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy folding table
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that a folding table wouldn't be able to stand up to dining and game use, but this is perfect and very sturdy. It comes with a leather type handle for easy transport and stores under the end of my queen size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a cake table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this table....I will definitely be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Parties By Flo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. Fits four comfortably. Probably could seat five. I love. Will order more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stayce Sedgwick

customer_reviews.title: Great Game Table
customer_reviews.text: This is our new game table. Very easy to fold and transport. Light to carry and move, but very sturdy. Lots of room. We use it for 5 to 6 people with no problem of bumping elbows or kicking each other.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This table was just what we needed. It's sturdy....and large enough to seat 4-6 adults. Since it folds in half, it's relatively easy to store and it's light weight enough to easily carry from room to room using the built-in handle. I recommend it for anyone who occasionally needs extra table space for entertaining or for craft projects.
customer_reviews.author: Poppa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for cards and easy to atore
customer_reviews.text: I love this table and bought two more. This table is light enough to carry easily but still sturdy. It is perfect for playing cards or Mahjong. Collapses for easy storage. Hard to find a 42” table and I have tried. Look no further. I also recommend the green felt cover.
customer_reviews.author: NanC

customer_reviews.title: A great cards table
customer_reviews.text: I like this table a lot. We mostly use it for card playing. It is larger (and heavier) than most card tables; it seats four luxuriously, and we got seven around it, admittedly cramped. The seam in the middle is not a detriment to card playing. It is easy to fold up. Finally, the table is quite stable and the top is very tough. (It is not very smooth, more like glossy stucco.) (Dunno if it stains or chips.)
customer_reviews.author: BookStruck

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this table. Replacing a very old card table. Great replacement! More tabletop at a very reasonable price. Very sturdy! This will last us for years.
customer_reviews.author: DG22RMK

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Great table...sturdy. No real assembly-just open the two halves and pull up the legs. Using it as a temporary patio table at the moment but the portability allows you to take it anywhere you need some extra table space. It eve arrived ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: bc

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to fold and unfold
customer_reviews.text: This works very well in my office space where I need to fold and unfold it frequently. It is a simple process to set it up and take it down, and can easily be done by one person. It is a sturdy and attractive table. Plenty of space for 4-6 people to sit around it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Everett

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: grt delivery here to Hawaii!! better than other similar sized table tables. very sturdy use 15 in our supper club
customer_reviews.author: tim stanton

customer_reviews.title: Very useful & easy to handle.....
customer_reviews.text: This is the best buy I have made in a long time. We have already used it for Thanksgiving. I am now wrapping presents on it. It will be back out for our Christmas eve luncheon! Folds and stores easily. One person can handle. Very sturdy when set up. Don't know what took me so long to buy one of these super useful tables!!
customer_reviews.author: Canashar

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We use this table for gaming or for crafts, we have moved it about many times. So far its been worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for the family holiday gatherings and they’re a great value. The same tables cost twice as much at the warehouse club.
customer_reviews.author: KGR

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: Light enough for one person to set up & move but sturdy enough to use. Perfect size for 6 or 7 & can squeeze 8. Stores easily - save the box!
customer_reviews.author: Buys a lot

customer_reviews.title: Creative Design and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly as expected with a durable top and unique folding leg design allowing for the table to fold in half. This table is perfect for those game nights at home, jigsaw puzzles, or that extra dining space you need for large family gatherings. Seats 4 very comfortably for dinner, but will accommodate six if necessary for dining or games.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: A hit at our 4th of July Party!
customer_reviews.text: We were able to seat all of our guests by adding this table! It will come in handy for many years to come. Sturdy, well made, yet light enough for me to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Blood

customer_reviews.title: nice addition
customer_reviews.text: We have two other tables from this manufacturer. Both are really good products. This one adds to their legacy of making fine products. It folds and unfolds very easily. Does not required two people to operate. Very sturdy. Leg lock in place firmly.
customer_reviews.author: Dom T

customer_reviews.title: Great table!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my table. Use it in my office at school to meet with teachers. Then when I need the space I just fold up that sucker and put him in the corner!
customer_reviews.author: PMS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the construction of the table but unfortunately it was badly damaged in transit. So I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: D Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again if occasion required!
customer_reviews.text: Love my 4 ft Fold in Half Table. We have a group that plays dominos & I needed an extra 4 ft table. I can carry it from where it is stored to my living area without any trouble, I am small so that means a lot! It is very durable & sturdy also.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbelle

customer_reviews.title: The folding table you want
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this table. it's sturdy and folds up beautifully in a half moon shape. We live in a small apartment, and this was half of our Thanksgiving table! It's also lightweight enough for me to carry it up and down stairs (I'm 32F, 5'3") I use it to prepare large baking projects and big meals as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Cage

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Very stable. Good top. Excellent size for Hand and Foot. Would be good for poker, too (w/stacks of chips).
customer_reviews.author: L. Black

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these tables for use with board games. They are easy to set up and easy to take down. Can be done by one person. They are sturdy and when folded in half can be easily stored. I was concerned the low price would mean they were flimsy. They are not.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Overall really good buy
customer_reviews.text: Overall good choice for outdoor or indoor arrangements of food/drinks etc. I wish if it could be a bit more sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: Neattzzz

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to set up/take down
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table to set up in the basement during the Winter months to do puzzles/crafts/games. Very sturdy, easy to set up/take down. Big enough for a 2000 piece puzzle. Plan on using it for camping trips also.
customer_reviews.author: Sean S.

customer_reviews.title: This table is perfect for extra seating for company
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. This table is perfect for extra seating for company. I used it for my son's graduation and it worked amazing. I also ordered a round table cloth and it dressed things up a bit. I will order more of these for my outdoor parties.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleen H.

customer_reviews.title: It was very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for games at the Nursing Home where I work. It was worth the money and was very sturdy and can fit 6 players at the table. Would but again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Terry Barth

customer_reviews.title: Great extra table
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for to add extra eating area to my parties. Is sturdy. Seats 4 chairs comfortably, could seat 6 with table leg between people's legs.
customer_reviews.author: JNeen

customer_reviews.title: well constructed!
customer_reviews.text: picky picky husband wanted this for a card playing table... i ended up taking it!! worked better than expected... quit sturdy easy to maneuver & light... yet again, quite strong very well constructed!!
customer_reviews.author: MOKEY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to use as an additional table for our Thanksgiving crowd and It was perfect very sturdy Much better than a card table. We only put 4 people at the table but I think it could easily take 5 to 6 people.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and folds away nicely
customer_reviews.text: We are camping in an empty house while we wait for our furniture to arrive from overseas. This table is great, it's pretty sturdy and folds away nicely, we will be able to reuse it for game nights later.
customer_reviews.author: Powerorchid

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I love having this folding round table. It's very sturdy, easy to set up and easy to fold and store. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeshopper

customer_reviews.title: Well made. I you need an awesome folding table this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite portable table. Just the right size for many uses.
customer_reviews.author: GARY B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it !!! Right now have a 1000 piece puzzle that's drivng me crazy, but plenty of room to spread the pieces out to see what's what.. The table is so sturdy I can sit and turn it around easily to reach what I need. I'll be able to fold it away to a closet when dot in use. beats a regular card table for games or crafts . Glad I bought it..
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great table for extra dining seating
customer_reviews.text: Great table for extra dining seating, but especially for games like Mexican Train or cards. Comfortably sat six adults around it. Nice that it can be put away behind a couch and easily taken out and set up.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: MahJong Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for my friends when we get together for game night! It tucks away nicely when not in use. Steady when in use. Easy to collapse and store. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. Folds up easy. We use it for the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived late
customer_reviews.text: Table is as described and is light and easy to move around. I ordered this one as I thought it was 2 day shipping and I was having a party. Did not arrive in time and I had to made do with what I had. Used the table for playing cards at Christmas and 7 of us were able to sit comfortably around the table.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Spade

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Table
customer_reviews.text: Great extra table. Needed extra seating for Christmas and this table did the trick. I was able to comfortably sit 5 people around the table. We could have added a sixth but it would have been a little tight. It's super easy to setup and store. I purchased a set of 4 Cosco chairs from Sam's Club for $43 to go with the table. I was able to use a rectangular table cloth doubled to cover the table. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: TECHCHIC

customer_reviews.title: Good porch table.
customer_reviews.text: Love this nice sized table. Easy to fold for storage. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maqsood Faquir

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service from this company
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived and was defective- the legs were wobbly- I ignited a return, UPS came once- I reached out to have them come again and with the company and no one ever replied to me after 3 tries- Now, I am stuck with this table that I am afraid to put anything on. Would not recommend! I would not even give them 1 star, but I am not able to leave that field blank in this review
customer_reviews.author: Lesly Renee Koo

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table. Easy to fold and the handle is very convenient for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce C

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect in my dinning room. You can setup for four or six people which i used it this Christmas. Very sturdy high grade material and it easy to fold-in-half round so easy to store. Im planning to buy one more this summer for my BBQ plan. Thanks John Gettysburg
customer_reviews.author: DAVID JOHN L MEJIAS

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great table & Great 💰 one did come in with a mic bump on it called Amazon they said if I keep it they would deduct and refund and they did just that paid little to nothing for the one dinged up lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for college apt.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this very sturdy table for my son’s new apt. And it’s the perfect size to seat 4 people. Plus it folds in half with a carrying handle to make it easy to move. Bought 4 folding chairs from Walmart to match.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my eat in kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Nice I can fold it away if needed. Light enough I can scoot it around and amazingly easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this table for wife's canasta card games. Traditional "card tables" are too small and flimsy legged. Believe it is a great table for extra dinner guest during holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great buy/Great table/Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I wanted more but they cmare currently unavailable. Just great!!
customer_reviews.author: Nike88

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Transport
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdy and easy to transport thanks to the fact that it fold in half. We bought it to use as a display table for our wedding cake, and it worked perfectly. It did arrive with a small dent at one of the corners where it folds in the middle, but that wasn't really a big deal. Now we're looking forward to having it for years to come to use at parties and get togethers.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Card Table
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I needed. Bigger than a regular card table and I really like the fact that it folds in half. In spite of the fact that the box it came in looked like it had been thrown off a moving train, the table wasn't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Surfsup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived well packaged and in good condition. It is easy to fold and unfold, I have used twice and is very sturdy when in use.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easily, folds nicely
customer_reviews.text: Just the thing for an extra table indoors or out. I like that it folds in half so you could store it behind a sofa or under a bed. Ours is in the garage though, up next to a wall. The table is pretty sturdy and you can fit 6 to 8 people around it. We spilled red drinks on it and it did not stain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Easy open and easy close. Very compact when closed and fits in tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: kaycocco1

customer_reviews.title: Highly functionable, low maintenance, sturdy, economical.
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to a larger apartment in a new city, so I was looking for a functional living room table to use for communal meals as well as a day-to-day work surface. I didnt need it to be too fancy, and not having a large furniture budget I was looking for something solid that was also portable in the event I decided to move homes again. For everyday use, I just have it bare. The surface is hard wearing and easy to clean. When I want to dress it up a little more, such as when I'm having company over, a simple $12-$14 round table cloth from TJ Maxx more than dresses the table up.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Tan

customer_reviews.title: It was worth it
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the table. It was hard to fold. One of my guest broke the table trying to fold it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This replaces an old-style square table. This table is so easy to use. It folds readily and you can store it under a bed. Wish I had discovered this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Bates

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and unfold. Very sturdy and a convenient hide away handel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Folding Table
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy yet easy to set up and move around. Use it on our deck as well as a card/ame table in the family room
customer_reviews.author: Bear Limvere

customer_reviews.title: Love the table, for cards also get felt cover!
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of us canasta players bought this table. Also would suggest getting the felt cover. Everything was new and our cards were sliding around for a couple weeks. The green cover visually adds to the fun.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hoham

customer_reviews.title: Mind the Gap
customer_reviews.text: it serves my purposes but the gap in the center where it folds will be something to keep in mind. It will be an issue when it comes to anything that needs a smooth surface --- writing, serving food/placing plates or cups. 2 people will end up dealing with the crack issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect to use for large puzzle project and can sit in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: EMMA LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution.
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy table! Portable and easy to set up for last-minute plans.
customer_reviews.author: cat on wheels

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: A last minute purchase for our Daughter's wedding! Have used it many times since then. Very versatile and holds a great amount of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda H.

product_meta.title: Lifetime 280064 Light Commercial Fold-in-Half Round Table, 4 Feet, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteLifetime 48-inch round fold-in-half folding table is constructed of high-density polyethylene and is stronger, lighter and more durable than wood. Will not crack, chip or peel, and built for indoor and outdoor use. Features a compact folding design with a secure locking system for safe and easy storage and transport. The built-in handle provides convenient carrying. Our revolutionary folding steel frame design provides a sturdy foundation and is protected with a powder-coated, weather-resistant finish. Perfect for home, crafts, parties or your next family gathering. Ready to use, easy to maintain and simple to store. Meets ANSI/BIFMA standards. Seating Capacity : 4
feature_bullets: Light commercial 48" Round table constructed of high density polyethylene for superior strength and durability
Easily folds in half and includes a built in carry handle for easy transport and storage; Folded dimensions- 47.9"L x 24.6" W x 3.4 H
Uv protected and rust resistant; Designed for indoor and outdoor use. Dimensions (open): 47.9 inches x 29 inches.Leg Tubing Diameter:0.98 inch
Stain resistant and easy to clean; backed by a 2-year limited manufacturer warranty
Lightweight design; only weighs 22.8 lbs!.Table Top Thickness: 1.69 inches
